Translations.Text: Ih, Bab iw d Oebbi id Issersen Tazmamt, i Ieemmlen lauuam
Wid tnaaoem, war Neppa, ur zmiren a kwen aawnen, ne$ ad aawnen iman nnsen
Ma tnecdem ten ar nnhaya, ur sellen. A ten twaliv a k id pmuqulen, nitni ur pwalin
Ddem ayen ilhan, ameo ar lewqama, veooef i wid ur nessin
Ma ilaaj ik Cciian ar dduni, ppkel $ef Oebbi. Neppa, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ih, wid ipeezziben, ma innul iten urbaa n ccwaien, a d mmektin, d$a ad asen llint wallen
Zgan $elien atmaten nnsen, d$a nitni ur xevvun
Ma ur asen d tebbwiv ara assekni, ad ak inin: "acimi ur t id isnulfa ara"? Ini: "teddu$ kan d wayen iyi d ippuweeean, s$uo Mass iw". Wagi, s$uo Mass nnwen, d tafat, d nnhaya, d aeunu, i ugdud iumnen
Ma qqaoen Leqwoan ssemeesset as, ssusmet, amar fellawen aeunu
Mmekti d Mass ik, deg iman ik, s wannuz akked lxuf, s wawal irsen, tauebeit, tameddit. Ur ppili seg i$wefliyen
Ih, wid illan ar Mass ik, ur sme$woen ara iman nnsen, $ef uabad iS. Sbuccuaen T, i Neppa kennun
